course.subject: ECON
course.name: Mathematics for Business and Economics
course.description: Application of mathematics to economic and business analysis; mathematical analysis and linear algebra; optimization methods.  For SBM students only.  Graded P or F.

reviews.author: Salamanca
reviews.title: Introductory math course for pg level study
reviews.comment_content: Covers frequently used basic concepts on topics about calculus, matrix, real analysis and static optimisation. It may be sufficient for the first semester micro course but not for the macro.
reviews.comment_teaching: Qinggong is very nice and his teaching is interesting. But I would say that sometimes he might be wordy on explaining concepts. He will answer all questions you have.
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is good and it seems that everyone could get a pass.
reviews.comment_workload: A problem set every week. Just simple application of concepts and tools and will be graded by efforts.

reviews.author: Alice2022
reviews.title: Very good!!!
reviews.comment_content: This course reviews some basic mathematics for economics, it's really for the subsequent study.
reviews.comment_teaching: Professor Wu is very nice, he explained every point clearly, and would answer all question if you have. The provided problem sets are very useful too.
reviews.comment_grading: All student would pass if you take part in the exam, and the exam is open book, attendance would not be recorded.
reviews.comment_workload: 1 homework every week, try to answer the question and you will get the full mark. You do not need to spend too much time on these problem sets.
